titleStmt.title: The humble petition and resolution of the county of Essex (presented to the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, and read in both Houses the 17 of this present June, 1642 : with the answer thereunto annexed, and commanded by the Lords to be forthwith printed and published).
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed June the 18 for Joseph Hunscott and John Wright,
